title: Habit Stacking Mastery for Neurodivergent Minds
description: Learn to build sustainable routines using the science of habit stacking. Specifically designed for ADHD and autistic brains that struggle with traditional habit formation. Based on Duke University behavioral science research.

setupSteps.question: What's one small habit you already do consistently every day? (e.g., brush teeth, make coffee, check phone, feed pet)
What time do you typically do this habit?
What's one new tiny habit you want to build? (Keep it under 2 minutes - we'll grow from there!)
What motivates you most? (accomplishment, helping others, learning, creating, solving problems)
